attributes.action: For children from age of 14 to be able to have  voting stations in schools
attributes.additional_details: So they get to be heard in the community and get the know what it's like to have a opinion in change
attributes.background: For schools to Have small voting sessions for 14 years and up so they have a voice in what happens

rejection.details:
We understand you want children aged 14 and over to "be heard in the community" but we're not sure what kind of elections you want them to be able to vote in, or whether you want them to be allowed to take part in 'mock elections' as part of their education.

You could start a petition calling for the voting age in general elections to be lowered to 14, if that is something you'd like to see happen.
